mapper.select: SELECT mem_num, mem_email, mem_nickname, basic_name, chaR_num FROM chat_member m JOIN member a USING (mem_num) JOIN member_detail b USING (mem_num) WHERE chaR_num = #{chaR_num}

SELECT
REPLACE(REPLACE(chaT_txt,'<','<'),'>','>') message,
chat_time, read_count, mem_num, mem_nickname FROM chat_text LEFT OUTER JOIN (select chaT_num, count(*) read_count FROM chat_read GROUP BY chaT_num) USING (chaT_num) JOIN member_detail USING (mem_num) WHERE chaR_num = #{chaR_num} AND chat_time >= (select member_date FROM chat_member WHERE mem_num=#{mem_num} AND chaR_num = #{chaR_num}) ORDER BY chaT_time ASC
